short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy Notion tables to formatted text. This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Notion Labs Inc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy Notion Tables with Perfect Formatting 📋✨

Seamlessly copy Notion tables while preserving their original formatting and structure. This extension makes it easy to share your Notion tables with perfect formatting in emails, documents, or any other application.

💪 Key Features:
✔️ One-click table copying with preserved formatting
✔️ Maintains column alignment and cell styling
✔️ Works with all Notion table types
✔️ Copies tables as perfectly formatted HTML
✔️ Clean, professional output ready to paste anywhere
✔️ Works with pages containing a single table

👉 Free Version:
✔️ Limited to first 50 rows

🔥 PRO Version Includes:
✔️ Copy tables of any size
✔️ No row limitations

Simple to use:
🔸 Open any Notion page with a table
🔸 Click the extension icon
🔸 Click "Copy Table"
🔸 Paste anywhere - formatting is preserved!

📌 Note: The extension works exclusively with pages containing a single table.

📪 Contact us:
For feedback, feature request, bug reports or suggestions please me at 💌 support@copynotiontable.com

Note: This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Notion Labs Inc.

Try the free version today and upgrade to PRO for unlimited table copying!
